content.detailedDescription: Cats woke up me and my girlfriend around 530am and when i went to go pee i looked out the window and saw this very bright round object just sitting up in the sky, so i went downstairs and got the ipad and recorded it for 10 minutes, which im including that footage, we both have been witness to 2 different ufo sightings before a few years back in this same area but we didn't have the camera in the car those times, this time it hapenned at home and fortunately we have the camera and filmed this magnificent light show of a u.F.O.
content.summary: Ufo over lorain county october 7th 2014

content.detailedDescription: I was on my way home as a police officer. i walked along our street and saw a star in the sky that looked different than the rest. he was also brighter than the other and it was not venus. the object was about 1 minute motionless in the sky, about 48 degrees above the horizon. it had the right and left two beams. the center looked around. suddenly it was about 1/3 bigger and brighter and then disappeared. there was only a black background.
content.summary: Star pulsing glowing light then getting bigger and dissapeart

content.detailedDescription: Went to the end of my driveway to talk to my daughter. noticed a round white object stationary, high in the sky. it was too early for stars to be out. the object appeared larger than a star would be. initially thought it could be a balloon or weather balloon. the object remained stationary for several minutes. could not judge altitude, but appeared to be very high. got my 35mm slr and looked at the object through my 50-250mm lens. object was round and appeared to have an indented bottom, but that could have been a trick of lighting. sat in a chair on the front porch to observe and take pictures. the object moved very slowly in a straight line heading east over an hours time. during that time a thin cloud moved past the object. the object was above the cloud. at approximately 1925 the object took on an orange shade from the setting sun. i lost sight of the object as the sun went down. i initially was not going to turn in a report, but the recent sighting in breckenridge co. seemed to be a similar object. this made me feel that it was more important to report this sighting.
content.summary: Sighted round white/silver? object stationary in clear sky

content.detailedDescription:
I was walking my dog outside on my front lawn before going to bed for the evening there was a full moon and some dark clouds when i look up i saw a boomerang object some lights were present on one of the spheres 
dull green yellow the rest were reflective sliver in the sky to my left their were two more in a column they flew from east to west faster than the commercial planes then another column of three this went on for 10 minutes commercial planes were flying either from boston ma or manchester nh some going northeast and northwest my wife and son were with me it appeared that some of the planes passed right by this boomerang object i have never seen anything like this before at first i though could it be stars but looking at the moon and the clouds were moving east and the boomerang objects were traveling west each column of boomerangs were identical
content.summary: Boomerang column of three traveling from east to west.

content.detailedDescription:
On sunday morning i saw this strange phenomenon – 13 hawks/crows that were circling in the sky over my part of the metro area of albuquerque, nm – in the northeast heights area – which is predominant residential houses and buildings - so i decided to film this occurrence and then to put some “strange animal happenings” video out on youtube.  i wasn’t expecting what i actually caught.

anyhow – i saw the formation, whipped out my cell camera….And filmed this strange happening.  the flock drifted slowly from the northwest to the southeast direction and i filmed it until i couldn’t see it anymore.

[link moved to fi section/cms/tg]


look for the ufo at the :55/:56 time stamp moving from south to north.  if you can pause it and zoom it…..It is an odd catch…..And oh yeah….Did i say….Fast!?

i've also included a word doc that has all the frames in the video i could catch.
content.summary: I was filming a flock of birds moving in a circular pattern and this white blip appears in the video about halfway through

content.detailedDescription: I was on i 80 going eastbound towards nevada at roughly 2200 at night when i saw lights in an oval to rectangular shape floating just above the mountains to the south of me. i noticed that it had around a dozen or so lights around the edge of it slowly changing colors from a golden to blues and the like. it didn't appear to be moving. i told my teammate what i had seen but she couldn't see it.  i had stopped at a truck chain up area to see if i could get a better look at what i saw but due to the trees i couldn't see it. this chain up area is about 6 miles west of the rest area at mile marker 177. when i got out of my truck i got the very distinctive feeling something was in the woods very close to me and i got back into my truck quickly and locked the doors.  as it was time for me and my teammate to swap out, we decided to do it there and quickly because we both got the feeling something was wrong.  we felt like we were being watched and it felt like something was about to come up to the truck and peek into the window. we quickly left and not even 10 miles later we saw a focused beam of light that if my teammate hadn't hit the brakes we most likely have been hit by it. the beam i saw was blue white in color and a single beam. my teammate saw 3 beams that were icy blue and a single beam that was blue, green and white in an pattern like water.
content.summary: Driving down interstate 80 at night and saw it to the south of me, stationary

content.detailedDescription:
The visibility was clear and the moon appeared almost full.  i decided to take a picture of it.  while i was preparing my cell phone to take the picture i observed three small bright lights flashing just below the moon.
i took the picture and when i examined it i noticed a faint orange object below and slightly west of the moon.  i enlarged the picture and using my magnifying glass could see very clearly a very large orange object with a white dome light on top of it.  my reaction and photographic evidence makes me convinced that this object is manufactured and bears further investigation.  i do not know how to transfer my photo to my computer.
content.summary: Ufo appeared below the moon.

content.detailedDescription: My sighting occurred sometime in the fall between 1997 and 1999. i cannot remember the exact date of my sighting; however i know that it was fall because it was football season. i was sitting in the bleachers before the start of a football game. there was one set of bleachers that faced the football field, and behind the football field was a forest. it was early evening, and there was still plenty of sunlight, not a cloud in the sky. out of nowhere a greenish ball of bright light appeared just above the tree line and was perfectly still. it was a solid light, not blinking or anything. after approx. 10 – 15 seconds, the ball of light shot off to the right faster than i have ever seen anything move. it moved faster than anything man made could even come close to matching. from time to time i still talk about it with other former classmates who also witnessed it. it is my one and only encounter, and i have never formally reported it. it is something i will never forget and i can still picture it in vivid detail.
content.summary: Bright greenish light observed during daylight in the late 90's

content.detailedDescription:
I am a mufon investigator (currently inactive)who lives in vail co, and on the night of september 2nd i was camping out at heart lake on the flat tops, lat 39'46"15.15n, long 107'19"8.20w, elevation 10,750 feet. this is a remote area that i like going to and make trips up there each summer. i also have had several ufo sightings in the past.
on this night, as usual, i was watching the sky as it was a clear night and bright as the moon was in the first quarter. looking towards the nnw i noticed a bright light below and to the right of the 'pointers' in the big dipper, about 15 degrees high in the sky. over the years i have gotten to know most of the major stars and constellations, and knew immediately this was not a star.
the light was stationary for about a minute then began to move very slowly to the west, much to slow for an aircraft or satellite. during this time a aircraft did go over at about 60 degrees moving much faster than the object i was observing. there were no flashing or blinking lights on the ufo, and after another minute of watching it as it moved i turned to grab my binoculars to get a closer look and when i turned back the light was gone. i scanned the sky in the area where i had last seen the object and saw nothing.
from my own experience i have to conclude this was an unknown/unidentified craft, probably of et origin.
content.summary: Light seen below big dipper, stationary at first then moved

content.detailedDescription:
2:46am
ventura, ca
over ocean, clear skies, three nights prior full moon
360 degrees nw

spotted two lights in sky, assumed commercial aircraft. noticed stationary position, then light to left moving slightly to left in wave pattern. 
both lights dim orange. grab phone camera to record video. once filming, two orange orbs close together, drifting slowly to left. third orb glowing brighter than other two, larger in size, moving slowly to right. notice phone camera not capturing lights. view of left two obstructed by tree. third larger moves towards other two, slowly vanishes from right to left. other two vanished. aprox 1-2 min duration. 
all three orbs reappear, now further spread apart from each other. orb to right larger and brighter than before, lower in position, oval shaped, all moving right descending. second attempt to film also unsuccessful. terminated viewing after fear of third orb appearing closer, brighter, lower. checked again aprox 5 min after, orbs gone.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Ventura, ca three orange orbs above ocean

content.detailedDescription:
I took my puppy out at 9pm, observed the moon, and a very large orange light came over the top of the neighbors house, far away, came into view.  the light had 3 others with it, in a row, staggered, not straight, pusling orange light like a camp fire.  i keep binoculars in the garage and grabbed them. they appeared to be a flare, very bright, slightly pulsating, with a defined top area over it almost reflecting, like a balloon.

i filmed them, two times with an htc one m8 smartphone. captured only 1 image and oddly one of the two films never saved, and one is only 2 seconds long?

the lights appeared to be moving as fast as a slow plane, like a cessna idling along in along in slow flight.  the orange was like a campfire on a beach.  the rear object began to flicker, then began a descent, straight down and blacked out, no longer visible, nearly immediately.  not a fast movement.  the lead object turned to the east (my left) heading towards north scottsdale.  speed was slow, turn was soft, sharper then a cessna, but not abrupt.  the lead object started to flicker and became hard to see, dimming until black, like it ran out of fuel (if it was fire).  the middle object had held its course, heading nw and then made a turn to the east also, same as the lead light, and then started to dim.  i was trying to find it in my binoculars when it dimmed out.  only the trailing light 'descended' while the others appeared to continue on.

i went in to check my film and found one movie missing and one screenshot or photo.  the movie that saved was only 2 seconds long.  i know i filmed it two times, i know i filmed it for a little bit, at least quite a few seconds.  something malfunctioned.  i was also scrambling to film this before they were gone, so perhaps i may have deleted it some how.  but very odd that one was only 2 seconds.

my thoughts are, being into aviation and being a plane spotter, is that it may have been balloons, a prank hoax, as they appeared to be balloons.  they were moving, and it appeared odd that if they were moving, how, as the wind was very still, it had been overcast all day.  perhaps there was a wind up there, but there was zero wind at ground level.  very calm.

the objects appeared to be moving along slowly, no ups or downs, just like a slow moving plane, and two of them 'very much did change course', as though they turned or were buffeted by a wind going in another direction.

the size appeared to be 4 feet in diameter, but man, this was night.  very hard to say.  they appeared to be at least a mile away.  they appeared to be coming from central phoenx, were perhaps over bell or union hills road at about 56th ave when i first spotted them.  they were quite bright and big.  a landing light is quite small.  these were like big flames, but had a like transparent halo over them.  horizontal flight, not climbing or descending, perfectly horizontal, and moving.

thats it.  nothing special.
content.summary: Three orange flame like lights slow flight

content.detailedDescription: I got this pic from a friend that took it. the orb is the first thingyou see then to the left you notice a triangle shaped thing. this happened on the same day as the colorado sightings. the pic is amazingly clear. their is even some sort of designs on the ship that are visable.
content.summary: Orb in the air and a triangle ship to the left. same day as colorado sightings i have a great pic

content.detailedDescription: I was in vista california and my friend and i were driving up her driveway toward her house. i first noticed the object because it was very bright in the sky and caught my attention. at first i thought it was a plane but when i saw the three lights and how they moved together in the sky i realized it did not move in the same manner as a plane. they were three very bright white lights that formed a triangle shape. one light on the top and two on the bottom. at first it was moving upwards and toward the left then it suddenly changed direction and was going straight down. it was at that point that i saw a plane flying nearby it and comparing the airplane with the object it was very obviously not a plane. when i saw it i was amazed and transfixed on how bright white the lights were. i wanted to get a picture but by the time i was trying to get to my phone the object had gone down below the trees and buildings out of my sight.
content.summary: It was three very bright white lights in a triangle shape.

content.detailedDescription: You can see at you tube ;[youtube channel name moved to fi section/cms/tg]
content.summary: Paralel formation same size. view by 160 persons .With [name removed/cms/tg] contacte.

content.detailedDescription: A co-worker and i were looking at a beautiful rainbow in the sky. we were cleaning a room in the hospital on the sixth floor. my co-worker asked me if i saw the same thing that she saw....Some blinking lights in the sky far away, but near the rainbow. she wanted to know if she was crazy. i saw them, and told her.  there were 5 to 7 objects seemingly twinkling in the day sky, near the rainbow. it was very odd. then within a minute or so, they were gone. then they reappeared not too far from where they were. i remember that i told her they twinkled. they seemed to be reflecting the sun, like metal does. after watching the glittery lights for a minute or so, they were gone.
content.summary: Several  glittery objects hovering near rainbow in sky

content.detailedDescription:
Sunday 10/5/2014 18:41pm (pst) near cupertino 95014
1. i was at the parking lot of chuck e cheese and moving birthday gift to the car.
2. it was very bright star but i noticed that there was no stars in the sky at the time of event.
3. maybe star or flying object
4. bright flying object was hovering over mountain park area near cupertino and it changed direction with trail after watching for a 20 seconds.
5. unusual event happened but was able to capture with my cell phone.
6. after recording the event about 13 seconds and decide it to capture it again with my camcorder. after pulling out the camcorder from the van which back door was opened it took about less than 10 seconds. pointing at direction of flying object with my camcorder, it disapeared.
content.summary: Ufo sighted over cupertino

content.detailedDescription: I was leaving dock to make delivery and saw two objects hovering and going west at a very slow speed.Was able to record with cell but did not come out very good.Saw it no more than5 minutes. arrived at next delivery location in 5 minutes and objects had disappeared.Disc closest to me was very shiny but object on other side did not reflect light,but both hovered close to each other.
content.summary: Saw2 disc hovering together

content.detailedDescription:
I was exiting the post office in pine, arizona and was just about to get into my car in the p.O. parking lot at the front of the building facing highway 87. i noticed that there appeared to be a storm front coming my way from the north and thought it would make a good picture as the sun was beginning to be covered by the oncoming storm front.  there was clear blue sky on one side of the sky and a dark oncoming curtain of clouds on the other side. i didn't notice anything unusual until my wife downloaded the picture into our computer about 21 days after i took the photograph.  we started to look closely at the picture i'd taken.  first of all, we noticed the sky was full of rays of light from the setting sun and many of the rays were different colors, blue, red, white, etc. it was very beautiful. my wife then noticed a bright, white, luminous orb-like object which appeared to be hovering over the highway about 30 feet from where i took the picture. at first my wife thought it was just a reflection from some type of shiny,  reflective surface hanging from a shop window or something, but upon closer investigation we observed that the "orb" was not suspended from anything at all, but hovering by itself above highway 87.  i did not see this "orb" at the time that i took the photo. 
we then began to look more closely at the surroundings in the photo and observed there were several small whisps of what appeared to be clouds above the mountain in the background.  we magnified the "clouds" and saw that the one on the far left of the photo resembled closely the classic saucer/disc type ufo, with a dome on top and what resembled landing gear or appendages of some type below.  upon looking at another "cloud", we saw that it, too, looked more like a saucer than a cloud because it was vaguely cigar-shaped and there appeared to be some type of energy burst (a circle) near one side of it. i don't know what that could be.  there is one other "cloud" that also resembles a craft of some sort, as when magnifying it the center becomes a solid block and the remainder of it seems to maintain the shape of a cloud. as i said, i did not see any of these objects until we closely observed the photograph after downloading it into our computer.  that's it.  there is a feeling my wife gets from looking at the photo that something is happening that cannot be seen, due to so many bright lights of different colors and the unusual cloud formations, not to mention the incredibly brilliant orb in the center of the photo, hovering above the highway.
content.summary: Did not see anything until downloaded camera photos into computer on this date, 10/06/2014

content.detailedDescription: Driving south on i5 between redding and sacramento ca. bright white lit diamond shape hovering stationary as we drove by. looking up at the object from the passenger side it hovered right above us. also a witness in the back seat. seemed like a drone or maybe a prototype for something new. we're seeing a lot of planes flying in and out of sacramento airport and we know the craft we saw isn't a plane. it's still there. it hovered there till we drove outta sight.
content.summary: Hovering diamond on i5 south of redding ca

content.detailedDescription:
At approximately 6am on two separate mornings about one week apart i observed star-like objects in the dark sky near the eastern shore of lake michigan, in west michigan, in grand haven.

the first observation included just one star-like object moving alone in the sky from west to east, about the speed of a small aircraft, but without the blinking lights.It was moving nearly directly overhead.It looked exactly like a star, but was obviously moving too fast. this object did not appear to change direction, but continued in a straight path across the sky.

the second observation included two star-like objects in the dark sky nearly directly overhead. these too looked exactly like stars, but again, these also were moving about the speed of small aircraft, but maybe faster.These two objects were moving north to south when i observed them.

i didn't observe these two objects as long as the first one because they came into view for only about 30 seconds and moved on; but these two objects appeared to weave in the sky in near-unison, while continuing in the same direction. they appeared to be one slightly ahead and to the side of the other.They appeared to "weave" together, kind of like birds do in flight.
content.summary: Two star-like objects travelling together and slightly changing direction in near-unison.

content.detailedDescription:
I observed first 1 bright orange light over head traveling roughly east/ northeast at a very high rate of speed. as it faded in the distance the second one appeared, (same description) traveling in the same direction. there was a high cloud over cast. the objects where clearly under the cloud layer. making no sound. no visible strobes. only the bright orange light. 
i call to my wife to come out and look. she arrived to see the second one in the distance. 

there is a nearby hospital. and helicopters frequently fly in and out. and other aircraft are frequently seen. but i have never seen anything like this before.
content.summary: 2 bright orange lights pass directly over head. headed roughly east/ north east

content.detailedDescription: Just got back from the store and my father said, "their goes a satellite", then paused when he realized how huge this thing was.  it was moving northeast slowly and was bigger than everything but the moon in the sky.  the sky was still a little blue at sun set, so it wasn't dark yet.  i see objects like this all the time except never this huge and bright.  the smaller ones i see people just say their satellites even though i have seen 13 in a 45min. period before with the naked eye.  does anyone have any information if the space station or something flew over at this time???  it was huge and bright!!!
content.summary: Huge star like object

content.detailedDescription: Witness was on a deck with his dog when he noticed a glowing white circular object ese from his position.  after viewing it for a few minutes he went inside but was able to continue observing for approximately 3 hours.  in that time he watched it through windows.  after that he did not see it again.
content.summary: Glowing white circular object near odessa, mo.

content.detailedDescription: I was at home about to watch a tv program. i was compelled to grab binoculars and look out window. the initial view was of just twinkling stars - changing colors from white, green, blue, red, purple. the large object appeared from behind trees in the distance (approx. over eastside san jose) and hovered for about a minute. i immediately sensed that this was not a normal everyday aircraft. it was moving south to north along the east san jose foothills. it moved extremely slow and would stop and hover from 30 seconds to a couple minutes each time. looking through binoculars -  it was a teardrop on its side – round at front and pointed in back. it was illuminated in front half – i could see metallic reflection. the back end had red, blue/green, and white lights. there were other aircraft in the area that were clearly smaller as if they could fit inside this huge object. when they looked like they might be going towards it the large object would brighten and flash 3 large red lights in triangle formation - two red lights on bottom and one on top. it travelled into my site and travelled out behind trees, poles and houses. it had to have come from gilroy area (south) going north towards oakland/san francisco. it must have been at least 20-25min's in my sites until it went passed trees and houses and i lost it but believe it kept going.
content.summary: Shaped like teardrop on its side slowly moving and stopping and hovering

content.detailedDescription: I was out side my house calling my cats in for the night i always look up that night when i looked up and to the west i saw an object coming toward me it was high and headed east it went right over my head it was shaped like a triangle with lights on each point it was transparent except i could see a line connecting between each point from light to light when i ran to side of the street to see were it went as it went over the house it had already disappeared it made my heart race and gave me an eerie feeling hard to explain the feeling i got and it sticks in my mind i continued to look for at least 2 more hours  with and uneasy feeling.
content.summary: Three dim lights,  in a triangle transaprent except faint line from light to light felt like it didn't want me to see it i felt errie after seeing it heart rasing still vivid in mind.

content.altitude: Treetop, 500 Feet or Less, Over 500 Feet (no cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription:
I have over 8,000 pictures that i shoot with a nikon d5200 and a nikon d80 using a 80mm - 400mm nikkor vr ii telephoto lens the 5200 takes video. i have hours of video from the past month and a half and without a doubt have irrefutable evidence life outside of humans exists or there is at least truth in what the bible calls an alternate dimension or a plane where beings exist that we cannot see.  why we can now i don't know.  previous to this event i was an atheist. now, if what i am seeing is real then there has to be an opposite.  i went to mcc for bio technology and would have laughed in someones face before the past month and a half.  i promise you.  you will not have to search any longer for e.T. life or ufo's to prove they are real.  this is it,  i have the evidence.  contact me asap please!  i called the mufoun director in new york over a month ago and havent heard back... 

2 monroe county sheriffs witnessed this too and brushed it off as lanterns.  i laughed and said ok if thats what were calling it.
content.flightPath: Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering,Unknown
content.summary: Sets of 3 orange spheres at same ratio between each 6 times same path

content.detailedDescription: I noticed an object approximately 500 yards n.E. i turned to a friend to say, "hey, take a look at this"! after i had turned to veiw it again-it was gone. this was at the time of the wildfires.The object appeared to be circular and black, dark in color.
content.summary: See below.

content.detailedDescription: In bed approximately 9:30 pm. saw through skylight window above bed a very bright orange light travel across sky from nw to se direction. it was bright enough to distract from the television light in the room. no sound and did not look like a shooting star, traveled straight path.  about 5 mins later saw same travel close to same path. looked like a flare almost except was traveling in straight direction with now residual tail. no planes in site at time and there was only the single orb shape.
content.summary: Orange orb like light in sky saw twice or two different

content.detailedDescription:
Yesterday i was watching my son playing with his cousin from the second floor of my father-in-law's house in central washington. they were watching their shadows and making them dance. it was really cute, and i thought that i should take a video of it. and i really wish i would've listened to my instinct.

it was a sunny day and their shadows were very dark and clear on the gravel. then i noticed a circular shadow about 20 feet in diameter pass over them going about 30 miles per hour. it wasn't as dark of a shadow, almost like the object that produced it would've been somewhat transparent. also, the shadow was darker toward the center with a distinct outer ring that was a very faint shadow in comparison.

since i had been watching the kids' shadows, i realized that whatever was going making the shadow would've been over the house and would immediately come into view and travel straight forward from my view.

i had a clear view of the sky, but nothing went overhead. anywhere. there were some birds circling in the distance, but a bird wouldn't make a circular shadow or go that fast. neither would a small, rogue cloud. no vehicle started up or fire was lit that would've made a cloud of smoke. i'm stumped!

i've never been one to think much of ufos, paranormal, unexplained phenomena, etc. i'm a science teacher and thrive on evidence, but i can't explain this and it's really bugging me.
content.summary: i saw a 20' shadow pass over the ground at 30mph, but couldn't find the source of the shadow.

content.detailedDescription: This is my 3rd time capturing this phenomenon with my phone camera. the other two times under same circumstances ; lots of clouds from chemtrails and an orb around sun that could be described as a circular rainbow around the sun.
content.summary: See pics
